O

onClientConnection(ClientThread) - Method in interface tcp.server.ChatObserver
event for a new tcp.client connection
onClientConnection(ClientThread) - Method in class tcp.server.EchoServerMultiThreaded
when a tcp.client connect to the tcp.server, send him the whole historyLog and thread-safely add it to the tcp.client list, then alert other tcp.client that a tcp.client joined the chat
onClientDisconnection(ClientThread) - Method in interface tcp.server.ChatObserver
event for tcp.client disconnection
onClientDisconnection(ClientThread) - Method in class tcp.server.EchoServerMultiThreaded
when a tcp.client disconnect, thread-safely remove it from the tcp.client list then, alert other tcp.client that a tcp.client has disconnected the chat
onClientMessage(ClientThread, String) - Method in interface tcp.server.ChatObserver
event for a new tcp.client message
onClientMessage(ClientThread, String) - Method in class tcp.server.EchoServerMultiThreaded
when a tcp.client send a message to the tcp.server, send the message to all connected participant

R

readMessage(byte[]) - Method in class utils.Message
method that populate the Message class attributes from the data received in parameters
run() - Method in class multicast.MulticastReceiver
method that runs indefinitely to listen for received messages, and print them when one is receive
run() - Method in class multicast.MulticastSender
method that runs indefinitely to listen for user input , and send message when user presses Enter Stops when user enters '.'
run() - Method in class tcp.client.ServerListenerThread
running the current thread listen to the input stream of the socket and write it on the terminal or the GUI
run() - Method in class tcp.server.ClientThread
listen to the tcp.client socket input in order to format the message with protocol then call a onClientMessage or onClientDisconnection event from the ChatObserver depends on protocolType
